sentence.Network_en: Foreigners must use their power to nudge the country towards greater tolerance.
sentence.Network_cn: 外国人必须动用他们的力量促使这个国家变得更加宽容。

sentence.Network_en: She slipped her arm under his and gave him a nudge.
sentence.Network_cn: 她挽住他的胳膊，轻轻推了他一下。

sentence.Network_en: McKinnon gave the wheel another slight nudge.
sentence.Network_cn: 麦金农又轻轻推了一下轮子。

PerfectNetExp.abs: <<轻推>>(Nudge)作者之一、行为经济学家理查德?塞勒(Richard Thaler)发明了"享乐主义的加工"(hedonic editing)这个短语,用来形容我.
英文“助推”(nudge)一词的原意就是“用胳膊肘等身体部位轻推别人，以提醒或者引起别人的注意”。以“助推”为书名，意在提醒你在选择 …

with oil prices nudging $ 140 a barrel , Saudi Arabia stands to receive a windfall this year of up to $ 400 billion , double what it earned from selling oil last year .在石油价格攀升至每桶140美元的时候，沙特阿拉伯在今年获得了一笔高达4000亿美元的意外横财，比去年的石油收入增长了一倍。

jx.jx_en_mean: used to draw attention to a sexual innuendo in the previous statement
jx.jx_cn_mean: 那个事情（用于引起对前述内容中关于性行为暗示的注意）

lj.lj_ly: haven't seen much of the beach—we've been catching up on our sleep (nudge nudge).
lj.lj_ls: （我们）没怎么看海滩——我们一直在补充睡眠（那个事情）。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent. (as a verb): of unknown origin; compare Norwegian dialect nugga, nyggja 'to push, rub'

entry.tran: (通常指用肘)轻推，轻碰(以引起注意)
entry.def: If you nudge someone, you push them gently, usually with your elbow, in order to draw their attention to something.

example.ex: I nudged Stan and pointed again...
example.tran: 我轻轻推了推斯坦，又指了一下。

example.ex: 'Stop it,' he said, and nudged the boy lightly with his knee.
example.tran: “别这么干了，”他用膝盖轻轻碰了碰那个男孩说道。

entry.def: If you nudge someone or something into a place or position, you gently push them there.

example.ex: Edna Swinson nudged him into the sitting room...
example.tran: 埃德娜·斯温森把他推进了起居室。

example.ex: The civil servant nudged him forward.
example.tran: 那个文职人员向前推了他一把。

entry.def: If you nudge someone into doing something, you gently persuade them to do it.

example.ex: Bit by bit Bob had nudged Fritz into selling his controlling interest...
example.tran: 鲍勃一步一步劝说弗里茨卖掉了他的控股权益。

example.ex: Foreigners must use their power to nudge the country towards greater tolerance...
example.tran: 外国人必须动用他们的力量促使这个国家变得更加宽容。

entry.def: If someone or something is nudging a particular amount, level, or state, they have almost reached it.

example.ex: ...a little-known stage play writer and actress who was nudging 40 and going nowhere...
example.tran: 一个年近四旬、一事无成、寂寂无闻的舞台剧作者兼演员

example.ex: The temperature when we were there was nudging 80 degree F.
example.tran: 我们在的时候，那里温度接近80华氏度。

entry.def: If you refer to a nudge and a wink or to nudge-nudge wink-wink, you mean that someone is referring to sex, especially immoral sex, in an indirect way.

example.ex: The article then listed a series of nudge-nudge, wink-wink rumors that have appeared in newspapers over the last two years.
example.tran: 文章接下来列举了过去两年间报纸上出现过的一连串性丑闻传言。

sentences.sentence: "She nudged my elbow when she saw her friend enter the restaurant"

means.word_mean: 2. push into action by pestering or annoying gently

auth_sentence.content: Just let it nudge your imagination to someplace better.
auth_sentence.res_content: Just let it nudge your imagination to someplace better.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Just let it nudge your imagination to someplace better.

auth_sentence.content: Governments are also giving the trend a nudge.
auth_sentence.res_content: Governments are also giving the trend a nudge.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Governments are also giving the trend a nudge.

auth_sentence.content: But they certainly did nudge it along, let's say.
auth_sentence.res_content: But they certainly did nudge it along, let's say.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But they certainly did nudge it along, let's say.

sentences.en: She gave me a gentle nudge in the ribs to tell me to shut up.
sentences.cn: 她用肘轻轻捅了一下我肋骨让我住口。

sentences.en: She nudged him playfully in the ribs.
sentences.cn: 她开玩笑地用胳膊肘触了触他的肋骨。

sentences.en: We have to nudge politicians in the right direction.
sentences.cn: 我们必须把搞政治的推向正确的方向。

sentences.en: People began to nudge the couple into going away.
sentences.cn: 人们开始劝说这两口子走开。

means.word_mean: (暗指与性有关的事)搂搂抱抱，眉来眼去

sentences.en: They’ve been spending a lot of time together, nudge nudge, wink wink.
sentences.cn: 他们老混在一起，眉来眼去，卿卿我我的。
